CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: A platinum plate was used as a working electrode.

Let's think step by step.

1. Identify the material mentioned in the paragraph: In this case, the material is "platinum".
2. Label it as "Material Name": Platinum.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:

1. Platinum plate: This is a specific type of material or property used as an electrode in the context of the paragraph. It can be considered a "Material Property" or "Material Entity" or simply a "Property Name" representing the material used for the electrode.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:

Paragraph: A platinum plate was used as a working electrode.

1. Platinum plate: This is a specific type of material or substance that serves as the working electrode in the context of the paragraph. It can be considered a "Property Value Entity" with the property "Material" and the value "Platinum Plate".
